title: User can quickly search for Professional Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to find a professional player quickly
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects "Professional Player" from quick search dropdown 
AND types in three characters
custom_expected: THEN search results are displayed in dropdown

title: Verify Advanced Search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user wants to do an advanced search
AND "Search" appears as an option in the left navigation for all users.
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the search button
custom_expected: THEN the advanced search page loads

title: Enhancement - As a user I want to be able to Save and Run Rule Checks on a MJ Contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a MJ Contract in a Preliminary state
AND user has permission to EDIT the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Save and Run Rule Checks" option on MJ Contracts within the Save split button (screenshot attached)
custom_expected:
THEN
- System will run all On Submit and On Save rules for the MJ contract and then save any changes made to the contract.
- A blocking message will display any errors or warnings found, using the standard styling for errors and warnings. 
- The title of the blocking message should be Errors detected and the text "Please update and try again" should be removed.
- The button of the blocking message should be "OK"
- Clicking OK will take the user back to the MJ Contract in view mode and a successful save notification will be triggered
- If no errors/warnings are found use a blue notification saying "No errors detected"

title: Update treatment of assignment bonuses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a contract exists for a player containing an assignment bonus
AND and that bonus is earned on or after 01/01/2017
custom_steps: WHEN that bonus is earned on or after 01/01/2017
custom_expected:
THEN assignment bonus should be included in the Actual Club Payroll of the club that pays the bonus in the contract year in which the bonus is earned 
BUT all other aspects of the assignment bonus article should remain unchanged

title: Update treatment of multiyear contracts signed during the season
custom_preconds: GIVEN a multi-year MJC has been created for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the MJC commences in the middle of a championship season
custom_expected:
THEN AAV calculation of years 2017 and beyond should be amended to include only a prorated portion of the player's Base Salary for the first season covered (no change to the CBT calc, only the AAV calc)
BUT otherwise there should be no change

title: Update Outright consideration
custom_preconds: GIVEN Article XXIII(C)(2)(f) has been eliminated
custom_steps: WHEN one or more MJ players have been placed on Outright Assignment
custom_expected:
THEN the salary attributable to players who were outrighted from the 40-man roster should be included in Actual Club Payroll 
AND any contracts outrighted from the 40-man roster before the effective date of this agreement should be excluded from Actual Club Payroll until and unless the player is selected back to the 40-man roster

title: Selects Major Contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked Create New button on the Contract History Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects Major Contract
custom_expected: THEN a preliminary contract for the same player will be launched

title: Create new Contract for Professional Player and update to approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has created a new contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user is updating the status of the contract
custom_expected: THEN they will be able to update the contract to approved

title: As a user I want approving a contract to stamp the attached contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user created a MJ contract 
And attached the contract
custom_steps: When the Contract is moved to an Approved or Approved for next year state
custom_expected:
THEN
The system will add an approval stamp to the "Approvals" page of the attached contract. 
The system will need to determine what page of the uploaded pdf the Approvals page is on and stamp in the proper coordinates. 
The stamp will be same as EBIS1

title: As a user I want to be able to indicate whether a Club is taking out additional insurance on a player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is creating a MJ contract
AND user is in Insurance information selection of the contract
custom_steps: WHEN user checks off "Life/AD will be purchased outside of MLB's programs"
custom_expected:
THEN 
-An "Additional Insurance Amount" box to display where the Club will be required to enter an amount. (Required only if displayed)
-No maximum will be enforced on the filed and it should use the same dollar formatting that the rest of the contract uses. 
-The Printed Life Insurance form that prints as part of the Contract will reflect the addition of the amount by stating the amount that will be provided to the Club, and by reflecting the additional insurance amount in the "maximum" value that is printed on the form (currently it is always 37 million).

title: LRD user adds a custom language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the LRD user has added a clause to the individual contract 
AND has clicked the language dropdown for the clause
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects custom from the dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the WISYWIG editor will appear in the contract form

title: LRD user can select a language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has LRD permission 
AND is creating an individual major contract 
AND is adding a specific clause to a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Language dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdown will display the stored Club-entered and stored BOC-entered language options for that specific clause
AND will also display a Custom option 
AND the user can select any of the options displayed 
AND the user cannot have more than one language selected for the specific clause

title: CLUB user can select a language for a specific clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has CLUB permission 
AND is creating an individual major contract 
AND is adding a specific clause to a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the Language dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdown will display the stored Club-entered and stored BOC-entered language options for that specific clause
AND will also display a Custom option 
AND the user can select any of the options displayed 
AND the user cannot have more than one language selected for the specific clause

title: View various stored languages
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user wants to view various stored languages
AND the utility is loaded with different languages
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the drop down menu
custom_expected: THEN all of the stored languages will display

title: As a user I want to be able to create a Major Contract for a Domestic Amateur player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user with MJC Admin permissions is viewing a Domestic Amateur profile
AND user is able to access the Create New menu on the profile
custom_steps: WHEN user selects Create New -> Contract
custom_expected:
THEN system should enable a secondary dropdown with "Major Contract" as an option
AND selecting "Major Contract" should launch a new, preliminary contract for the player
AND the contract workflow should work the same as for any other free agent, including the autocreation of a Sign Free Agent transaction (see add player to roster rules) and ALL business rules
AND the approval of the Sign Free Agent transaction should trigger the player's amateur profile being converted to a professional player profile
AND when the contract loads, the browser tab info for the Major League Contract should be Maj Cont - Last, Roster First

title: As a user I want to be able to create a Major Contract for an International Amateur player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user with MJC Admin permissions is viewing an International Amateur profile
AND user is able to access the Create New menu on the profile
custom_steps: WHEN selects Create New -> Contract
custom_expected:
THEN system should enable a secondary dropdown with "Major Contract" as an option
AND selecting "Major Contract" should launch a new, preliminary contract for the player 
AND the contract workflow should work the same as for any other free agent, including the autocreation of a Sign Free Agent transaction (see add player to roster rules) and ALL business rules
AND the approval of the Sign Free Agent transaction should trigger the player's amateur profile being converted to a professional player profile
AND when the contract loads, the browser tab info for the Major League Contract should be Maj Cont - Last, Roster First

title: As a user I want to be able to delete MJ Contracts in post-preliminary states
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC admin user is logged in with delete permissions for MJ contracts
custom_steps: WHEN a user opens an MJ Contract that they have permission to edit
custom_expected:
THEN if the contract is in a Preliminary, Terms Submitted, Ready for Signature or "Pending Approval" state (not Pending Approval Terms Confirmed), user should see a "Delete" button
AND clicking "Delete" should prompt the user that they wish to permanently delete the contract (as it works now for Preliminary)
AND if user confirms - the contract should be deleted from the system and a blue successful delete notification should be displayed

title: As a User, I want MJCs to read the Primary Legal Entity from the MJ Club Profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN multiple Legal Entities have been added to an MJ Club Profile 
AND  one of these Legal Entities is listed as Primary
AND an MJC has been created for a player for this MJ Club
custom_steps: WHEN user prints MJC for a player from this club
custom_expected: THEN Legal Entity displayed on the MJC should match whichever Legal Entity is listed as "Primary" on the MJ Club Profile

title: User Clicks Pay SCH button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to add a Payment schedule to the contract they are creating
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the Pay SCH button
custom_expected: THEN the system will open a Payment scheduler pop up

title: User calculates Payment amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked on Pay SCH
custom_steps: WHEN the user populates the other required fields Principal Amount and Interest Rate and clicks Calc next to Payment Amount
custom_expected: THEN the system calculates and populates the Payment Amount Field

title: User calculates Interest Rate
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has  clicked Pay SCH on a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user populates the required fields as well as Principal Amount and Payment Amount and clicks Calc next to Interest Rate
custom_expected: THEN the system calculates and populates the Interest Rate field

title: User calculates Principal Amount
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has clicked Pay SCH on a contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user populates the required fields as well as Interest Rate and Payment Amount and clicks Calc next to Principal Amount
custom_expected: THEN the system calculates and populates the Principal Amount field

title: User clicks OK
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has filled out all required fields on the Payment schedule
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks OK
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check and stores the values 
AND the user is returned to the Contract with the Pay SCH button updated to blue to reflect that a Payment schedule has been entered

title: Max salary cut rule
custom_preconds: GIVEN the max salary cut rule is not met (ex. Enter $100 for major league compensation Base and Guaranteed Salary)
custom_steps: WHEN override message is clicked
custom_expected: THEN flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Signing date more than a month BEFORE current date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract has a signing date before the current date
custom_steps: WHEN the signing date of a contract is more than a month before the current date
custom_expected: THEN a flag is set and contract moves to next state

title: Terms Submitted > Ready for Signature
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract in the Terms Submitted state
custom_steps:
WHEN user attempts to move contract to Ready for Signature without correcting current flag 
AND clicks override button
custom_expected: THEN flag remains

title: Pending Approval (confirmed or not) > Approved or Approved for next year
custom_preconds: GIVEN a flag is set for a contract in Pending Approval (confirmed or not)
custom_steps: WHEN a user would like to Approve contract for this year or next
custom_expected: THEN flag is removed

title: Payments Tab Notification - if payment source disappears in contract update for a manually modified payment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user in the permission group: LRD - Contracts - Admin is logged in 
AND a contract exists containing a Payment Source for which there exists manually modified payments
custom_steps: WHEN changes are made to a contract that entirely remove the Payment Source
custom_expected:
THEN LRD user should receive a notification
AND  description should read: "Payment Tracking - No longer calculating a payment which had manually modified values"
AND description should be a hyperlink to the affected Contract

title: BOC user can edit Season Days
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD is viewing the Payroll tab of an approved contract
custom_steps: WHEN they click edit, updates Season dates fields, and click save
custom_expected: THEN the changes they made will save successfully

title: LRD can view players current or previous contracts on Contracts Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a Professional Players profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the contracts tab
custom_expected: THEN the tab will load displaying the Contracts history widget which displays the information of any current or previous contracts that the player has in the system

title: Club can view players current and previous contracts on Contracts Tab
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on a Professional Players profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the contracts tab
custom_expected: THEN the tab will load displaying the Contracts history widget which displays the information of any current or previous contracts that the player has in the system

title: BOC user can view Approval items
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a BOC user wants to view a listing of any Approvals items
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in and views their homepage
custom_expected: THEN the system displays Approvals widget that contains pending approval items

title: BOC can open Player Profile from clipboard
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user is viewing the Approvals Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Player's Name hyperlink under "Player" column
custom_expected: THEN Player Profile is opened in the same window

title: BOC user can view comments
custom_preconds: GIVEN that a contract has comments within the general comments section and bubble is present
custom_steps: WHEN user click comments bubble
custom_expected: THEN comments are displayed

title: BOC user can view flags
custom_preconds: GIVEN a contract contains Flags and a flag icon is present
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks flag icon
custom_expected: THEN the associated flag set that is contained in the form is displayed

title: LRD user can open contracts that need attention to
custom_preconds: GIVEN that LRD user wants to open a contract that needs attention
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Type" from Approvals widget
custom_expected:
THEN contract is opened in either view or edit mode

*Test Terms Submitted, Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed), and  Pending Approval states before approving*

title: Agent profiles display in widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD wants to view a directory of agent profiles
custom_steps: WHEN the LRD locates the Agents Widget
custom_expected:
THEN the agent profiles should be reflected in the Agents Widget
http://30ac5x.axshare.com/#p=dashboard

title: Open Agent profile from widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to open agent profile from the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the agent hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN that agent profile opens

title: Open Agency Profile from Agents widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to open an agency profile from the agent widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the agency hyperlink
custom_expected: THEN that agency profile opens

title: BOC creates new agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user wants to create a new agent profile and has permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to create new button on the agent widget
custom_expected: THEN a new agent profile will load in edit mode

title: BOC saves new agent profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save a new agent profile and has permission
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the save button
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check
AND the profile saves
AND the profile is visible in the agent widget

title: Spreadsheet upload

GIVEN the LRD wants to upload a Player/Agent spreadsheet
AND the user selects the "Import Spreadsheet" button from the Agent widget
custom_steps:
WHEN the file browser opens accepting only correct file types
AND the user selects a file
AND the spreadsheet has no errors
custom_expected:
THEN a loading indicator appears
AND system runs a rules check
AND window closes

title: Verify BOC can view directory of agencies
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view the directory of agencies
custom_steps: WHEN the user scans their Agency widget
custom_expected: THEN all agencies should be listed

title: BOC creates a new agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to create a new agency profile and has permission
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 'create new' from agency widget
custom_expected: THEN a new Agency profile will open in edit mode

title: BOC saves a new agency profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to save an agency profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the 'save' button in the Agency profile
custom_expected:
THEN the system runs a rules check and profile is saved
AND Profile appears in Agency widget

title: Verify list of agents associated with Agency
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view a list of agents associated with an Agency
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to an Agency's profile
custom_expected: THEN all active agents associated with the Agency profile are listed

title: Verify list of players associated with Agency
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user wants to view a list of players associated with an Agency
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Agency's profile
custom_expected: THEN all players associated with that Agency will be listed

title: View Award Entry Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user want to view a player's awards
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects Major Contracts from the left nav
custom_expected: THEN user is taken to the award entry utility

title: Verify 'Year' dropdown contains entry for each year of players record (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is in Award Entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'Year' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the dropdown will display an entry for each year from the current year to the first year of record (1991)

title: Verify 'League' dropdown (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to the award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'league' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the 'league' dropdown contains AL, NL and a blank tab

title: Verify 'Award' dropdown (No Position)
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has navigated to the award entry utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the 'award' dropdown
custom_expected: THEN all awards are listed alphabetically

title: As a BOC admin I want to run the MJ Award Bonus Batch
custom_preconds: GIVEN "MJC Award Bonus Batch" is a batch option under the "Major Contracts" section on the batch screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "MJC Award Bonus Batch"
custom_expected:
THEN system should open the batch in the batch screen 
AND the batch parameters should display per the batch requirements
AND a "Run" button should be available
AND clicking "Run" should run the batch according to the selected parameters
AND when the batch is run system should: 
    - Get Contracts with Award Bonus Terms, Salary Escalators and Conditional Options that are currently in an Approved, Update Approved, Expired or Approved for Next Year status that contain a contract with an Award Bonus or criteria that is not yet marked official
    - Iterate over contacts containing awards
    - Process Award 
    - Check for bonus terms and place finished values
    - Update salaries/earned amounts as necessary
    - Calculate Vesting Options
    - Calculate LRD Present Values
    - Calculate Earn Assignment Bonuses
    - Calculate Bonus Maximums
    - Calculate LRD Salary
    - Calculate Total Guaranteed 
    - Set offered and earned bonus amounts
    - Save contract
AND results should only include players who had a contract updated by the batch and should display in the "Batch Results" widget
AND available columns should be Player ID, Player's Name, Org, Club, and Roster Status
AND batch run information should display in the batch history widget.

title: As a BOC admin I want to running the MJ Award Bonus Batch to generate notifications
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user is attempting to run the MJ Award Bonus Batch
custom_steps: WHEN user runs the batch in Update Mode
custom_expected:
THEN a notification should be generated for any clause that is updated
AND if an award bonus is marked earned, Notification #1 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with
AND if a salary escalator with an award criteria is marked earned, Notification #3 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with 
AND if an Option with an award criteria is marked earned, Notification #6 should be generated for the BOC MJC Admin and the Club MJC Admin that the player is currently signed with

title: BOC admin view MJ Contract Statistics batch screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has navigated to the batch screen
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the MJC stat batch link
custom_expected:
THEN available batch parameters fields will display and function in a widget at the top of the batch screen
AND Mode and Run As dropdown fields will display and function in batch parameters widget
AND Run and Back buttons will appear and function
AND widgets follow wireframe and AC

title: LRD user access the Payroll Report Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the LRD user has navigated to the Major Contracts dashboard on left nav
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Payroll Reports Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the utility will load 
AND by default the utility will only display the Year and Type dropdowns. Both default to blank. 
AND the View button is also visible but is disabled.  
AND Year dropdown has all previous year for which reports have been saved, and the current year and following year.

title: Generate a New Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility 
AND has selected a Year and "New" for Type [C182117]
AND has completed the "As of" and "Save As" fields 
AND the Generate Button is now active
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Generate
custom_expected:
THEN  Clicking Generate will generate the CBT Impact Player Details Report, and the LRD Impact Player Details report and display the report in the utility, per the wireframe (styling and other specifics to be handled in follow up stories). 
AND CBT Impact Player Details will be displayed by default. 

AND Wireframe:
http://copbdc.axshare.com/#p=payroll_report

title: LRD user views a different Org's LRD 40-Man Payroll or CBT Payroll
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Payroll Report (saved or generated)
custom_steps: WHEN the user changes the "Org" dropdown and the "Show" dropdown
custom_expected: THEN the report will update based on the selected dropdowns

title: View existing Saved Payroll Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a Year and selects anything OTHER than "New"
custom_expected:
THEN the View button becomes active 
AND clicking View will load the saved report

title: LRD User Edits Payroll Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Saved or newly generated Payroll Report
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Edit
custom_expected:
THEN the form will load in edit mode 
AND all filters will become disabled 
AND only the totals and any rows associated with players that have been removed will not be editable. All other fields will be editable

title: LRD User Saves changes to a Payroll Report
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has made edits to a Payroll Report [C182455]
AND is still in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN all entered values will be saved 
AND the form will load in view mode 
AND a successful blue notification will display

title: Access Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user (admin-boc-all) has clicked Major Contracts from left navigation
custom_steps: WHEN they click on the Payroll Forecast tab that displays
custom_expected: THEN the utility will load and display the Yeah, Show, and Org dropdowns

title: Default Dropdowns for Payroll Forecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN the user first views the dropdowns
custom_expected:
THEN the dropdowns  should default as follows: 

1. Year dropdown has the current year and the next 10 years contained in the dropdown, and defaults to the following year. (Ex: Right now in 2016 it would start at 2016 and go out to 2026, but default to 2017). 
2. Show dropdown contains All Players and Manually Modified Only options, and defaults to "All Players". 
3. Org defaults to "All", and has All and each of the 30 Orgs as an option.

title: View Payroll Forecast
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects values for each dropdown 
AND clicks the activated View button
custom_expected:
THEN the utility will load and display the selected criteria 
AND the top filters will remain editable with "View" button still enabled

title: Edit Payroll Forecast utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is logged in and viewing Payroll Forecast Utility
AND edit button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks edit button
custom_expected:
THEN system should reload the form in edit mode
AND all of the filters should become disabled
AND the "View" button at the top of the page should also be disabled or not display
AND Payroll details section should be displayed in edit mode, per the wireframe
AND the only values that should not be editable in the Payroll details are the totals and any rows associated with players that have been removed
(Additional values that cannot be edited are detailed in the story #125729051.LABELS)

title: Add new Cash Transactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user is viewing the Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
AND "Add Transaction" button is displayed beneath the Cash Transactions portion of the utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Transaction"
custom_expected:
THEN system should launch a popup that allows the user to select the Payor, Payee, Transaction Date and Amount that are associated with the transaction
AND an "Add Transaction" button should become enabled when all of the required fields have been entered properly
AND clicking this "Add Transaction" button should close modal, and populate Cash Transaction table of BOTH LRD and CBT payroll report utility with cash transaction information for selected Org
AND the reverse of the transaction shhould also be added to the counterpart's cash transactions table so that for one it appears as a positive, and the other as a negative. (Ex: If Payor is ARI and Payee is BOS for a transaction of 1,00,000, then ARI will have that amount subtracted from their totals while BOS will have it added)
AND if the filter is set to "All" then the cash transaction should only be displayed once

title: Save changes to Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND user is viewing the Payroll Report Utility in edit mode
AND "Save" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save"
custom_expected:
THEN system should save all of the entered values, and reload the utility in View mode
AND successful blue notification should display

title: View which rows have been manually updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as LRD user
AND changes to a player's details have been manually modified in the Payroll section of Payroll Forecast Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Payroll Section of Payroll Forecast Utility in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a "Reset" button should appear in the row associated with the player whose details were changed 
AND once changes have been saved a green check should appear in view mode

title: Payroll Forecast Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN accessing and updating the Payroll Forecast Utility is a permission set that can be added to an existing user
custom_steps:
WHEN a user (LRD - Contracts - Admin role group, by default) with this permission set logs in 
AND user navigates to Major Contracts Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN Payroll Forecast tab should appear on the Major Contracts Dashboard
AND user should be able to access and update Payroll Forecast Utility 
BUT users without this permission should not be able to see "Payroll Forecast" tab
AND users without this permission should not be able to view the utility anywhere in the system

title: As an LRD user I want to be able to print the Forecast Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an LRD user is viewing the Payroll Forecast Utility
AND there is a "Print" button available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print
custom_expected:
THEN system should run the Payroll Forecast Utility report with the same criteria as are currently selected on screen
AND the report should run successfully just as if it had been run directly from the Reports widget

title: Club user views Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the club user has logged in 
AND has clicked Major Contracts from the Left nav tab
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Deferred Compensation Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the Club's Deferred Compensation funding utility will load 
AND The Org displayed will be locked to the Club user's Org (cannot view other Orgs). 
AND "Funding As Of" will default to July of the current year through July, and July of the following year through December. (Ex: In August 2016 this will read July 2017) 
AND Discount Rate is defaulted to 5%.

title: View player's details in the Deferred Comp funding screen
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp funding screen 
AND is viewing an Org's Deferred Comp
custom_steps: WHEN the user expands the row of a specific player
custom_expected: THEN expanding a row will display as many rows as are needed within that expansion to capture the information for the player, including all payment sources relevant to the current values entered into the Deferred Comp Funding screen.

title: As a user I want to be able to print the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in with permission to print the Deferred Comp Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Print
custom_expected:
THEN system  should print the deferred comp utility as it is displayed on the screen starting
AND the report and layout should match the specifications

title: As a user I want to view each payment source
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has navigated to the Deferred Comp Screen 
AND if viewing a specific's Org's Deferred Comp
custom_steps: WHEN they expand a Player row
custom_expected:
THEN the sources column will change from the number of sources when the row was unexpanded to listening out each payment source. 
AND the number of payment sources should match the number that displayed when the row was unexpanded 
AND Each Payment Source will display the Date, Amount and Present Value of the deferred compensation associated with that payment source. 
AND  Each player will also have a Payment Source labeled "Totals" that will display the total Amount deferred (Amt), the total amount funded as of the entered date (fnd) and the present value of the deferred comp (PV) and the present value of the funded deferred comp (Fnd PV).

title: As a user I want to be able to run the Deferred Comp Funding Report
custom_preconds: GIVEN "Deferred Comp Funding" is an option in the Report Listing widget with a Category of Payroll
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the Deferred Comp Funding report
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow the user to set the prompts according to the documentation
AND clubs should ONLY be able to select their own Org
AND the data displayed in the Deferred Comp Funding report should equal the data generated by the Deferred Comp Utility when the same criteria are entered
AND the report and layout should match the specifications
AND a new permission group to control the visibility of this report should be created and added to the existing admin-xxx-all user ids

Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Payroll+Comparison+-+Report+Layouts

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Payroll+Comparison+-+Report+Details

Report Consolidations and Custom Groups: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Payroll+Comparison+-+Consolidations+and+Custom+Groups

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Payroll+Comparison+-+Prompts

GIVEN a user is logged in as club or boc
AND user has navigated to Reporting Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks link for Official Payroll Comparison Report
custom_expected:

AND Entering the desired prompts and running the report will work and match the requirements. 
AND The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

title: As a Tester, I want to access the MJC API through the ebis link interface
custom_preconds: GIVEN a tester is logged in using an account with correct API credential
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to "EBIS Link" screen from left nav
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a UI to select the MJC API, and to supply input parameters
AND user should also see the returned API response in a readable JSON format (with indents)
AND UI should have a basic Expand and collapse feature

title: Receive error if signing player that was Unconditionally Released under certain conditions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and attempting to create a Major Contract for a Professional Player 
AND selected player was previously Unconditionally Released by the Signing Org 
AND this player's UR was between Aug 31st of the previous year and start of the current season
AND current date is before May 15th
custom_steps: WHEN user updates contract status (On Submit rules are checked)
custom_expected:
THEN system should show error "This player was conditionally released by the signing org between August 31st of the previous year and the start of the current season. This Player cannot sign a MJ contract for the same Club until May 15th."
AND clicking "Back" should return user to entry point
